Recommend.SERVICE_NAME:
INSERT INTO rule_context(context_name,rule, rule_group, rest_url, rest_header, rest_body, context_desc , delimeter, msg)
select algorithm,concat( '(check_method() && typeof ticker' , ' !== \'undefined\' && ticker == \'',?,'\')' , ' && ' , group_concat(X.rule separator ' && ') ,
' && SET(\'band_buy\',\'Y\') && buy_now_ver_2(false,true) && set_strategy(\'',algorithm,'\',\'',algorithm,'\')'
), ? , 'https://api.telegram.org/bot{=token}/sendMessage' ,
'{\'charset\':\'utf-8\'}',
concat('{\'chat_id\':\'{=channelId}\', \'text\':\'',algorithm,'\'}'),
algorithm,
'|',
algorithm
from (
select concat(?,'-',?,'-',?) as algorithm, concat('(typeof ' , name , ' !== \'undefined\' && ' , 'parseFloat(' , name , ') <= ' , (value * (1+5/100)) , ' && ' , 'parseFloat(' , name , ') >= ' , (value * (1-5/100)) , ')') as rule
from coin_slope_stats
where code = ?
and date = ?
and time = ?
and name not in ('ma5','ma10','ma15','ma20','ma50','min_ma10','min_ma15','min_ma20','min_ma20_lower','min_ma20_upper','min_ma5','min_ma50','static_max_yesterday','static_min_yesterday','touch_min_ma10_upper','touch_min_ma5_upper','volatility_close_price','volatility_high_price','volatility_low_price','volatility_open_price','volatility_target_price','coin_trend_down_avg','coin_trend_down_max','coin_trend_down_min','coin_trend_down_std','current_price','d120_avg_price','d15_avg_price','d20_avg_price','d5_avg_price','d50_avg_price','m10_avg_price','m20_avg_price','m50_avg_price','m5_avg_price','m15_avg_price','ewma5','ewma10','ewma15','ewma20','ewma50','min_ewma5','min_ewma10','min_ewma15','min_ewma20','min_ewma50')
) X
